title: Donald Trump Jr.
deleted: | quote = {{nbsp|4}}{{font|font=Times|size=12pt|"Well, why aren't they talking about deaths? Oh, oh, because the number is almost nothing. Because we've gotten control of this, and we understand how it works."}}
